subject: Playoff Games
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: When Detroit’s Damien Brunner scored the game-winner on Anaheim goalie Jonas Hiller on Monday night, they showed how far Swiss players have come in the N.H.L.
snippet: When Detroit’s Damien Brunner scored the game-winner on Anaheim goalie Jonas Hiller on Monday night, they showed how far Swiss players have come in the N.H.L.
